attributes.action: Allow everyone to be un-banned from the farm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: everyone has been banned from the farm he lives by. we all  needs the maze field for exercise and to walk our dogs the maze field is a great tourist attraction for everyone and has a public footpath, which we are not allowed to walk through so it is awkward for getting to school. the farmer banned us from the area for cooking beans by the field. however, not only have we beeen banned from the maze field but we have had our air riffles taken from us for shooting diseased rabbits.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
